name: part_007
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz finishes singing 'Kizuna no Kiseki' while being massaged during the first half of the karaoke battle.
Post-song evaluation and score reveal for the first challenge. IRyS and Kronii cheer for Bae's performance.
Introduction of the foot massage therapist, Naoko Takita, for the second half. The atmosphere becomes tense and fearful.
Baelz decides to go first and chooses 'Baka Mitai' as her next song, preparing herself mentally for the pain.
Hakos Baelz performs 'Baka Mitai' while undergoing a painful foot massage, leading to a chaotic and high-pitched rendition.
Score reveal for the second challenge and Kronii prepares for her turn as the girls react to the intensity of the massage.
